title: How to Kill Krauser in Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Take out your knife.
steps.description: When he goes left and right (he moves way too fast), shooting him is impossible! If you knife him enough, he will throw a flash grenade. Knifing him is the preferred way.

steps.headline: Wait for the battle to start.
steps.description: Make sure you hit the dodge button! You lose health and get knocked down, but when you climb out, he's right there! Now, quickly take out your knife and knife his legs. Raise the knife upwards, and keep holding the button and Leon will keep knifing. After 6 knife stabs, he's dead! Easy... huh?
